title: How to Pay With a Vanilla Gift Card on Amazon

steps.title: Activate a Vanilla gift card.
steps.content: Activate a Vanilla gift card. Before you can spend your Vanilla Visa/Mastercard gift card on Amazon, you must activate the card. This wikiHow article can help you do so.

steps.title: Tap ☰ in the lower-right corner of the Amazon app.
steps.content: Tap ☰ in the lower-right corner of the Amazon app. Open the app if you have not already, then find the ☰ icon along the bottom of your screen.

steps.title: Tap Gifting & Registry.
steps.content: Tap Gifting & Registry . It is one of the first tiles atop the page, under Shop by category . This tutorial will show you how to add some or all of your Vanilla gift card balance to your Amazon balance , as opposed to adding the gift card as a separate payment method. Turning your Vanilla gift card balance into an Amazon gift card balance is the best option, as you cannot purchase items exceeding your Vanilla balance if you use it as a separate payment method.

steps.title: Select Gift Cards.
steps.content: Select Gift Cards . It is located atop the list.

steps.title: Scroll down and tap View your balance.
steps.content: Scroll down and tap View your balance .

steps.title: Select Reload Your Balance.
steps.content: Select Reload Your Balance . This will open an Amazon shopping page through which you can add funds to your Amazon Gift Card balance.

steps.title: Enter the amount you want to add.
steps.content: Enter the amount you want to add. Amazon provides options of $25, $50, or $100, but you may want to select Other and enter your gift card's exact balance. [1] X Research source When ready, tap Buy Now . You can also enter a lower amount to preserve some of your gift card's balance for use elsewhere.

steps.title: Add your gift card as a payment method.
steps.content: Add your gift card as a payment method. Tap Add a credit or debit card and enter your Vanilla gift card's details. This will save the card as a payment method on Amazon, while also using the balance to purchase an Amazon gift card. From there you can shop freely on Amazon and use your gift card balance to check out.

steps.title: Navigate to Account & Lists > Account.
steps.content: Navigate to Account & Lists > Account . From the Amazon homepage, hover your mouse over Account & Lists (you will see your name here as well) and click Account .

steps.title: Select Gift Cards.
